description: The group or partition is in a good state
The group is not found for this cluster
The group or partition is in a warning state. For example, the offsets are moving but lag is increasing
The group is in an error state. For example, the offsets have stopped for one or more partitions but lag is non-zero
The partition has stopped. For example, the offsets have not been committed in a long period of time
The partition has stalled. For example, the offsets are being committed, but they are not changing and the lag is non-zero
